hero_desc: Leading provider of substation accessories and industrial equipment for sustainable growth
tentang_cbs_desc: We are a leading provider of substation accessories and engineering solutions, committed to delivering excellence and innovation across industries. Our business scope includes manufacturing metal & rubber goods, including metal casting for industrial needs.
misi_2: Continuously innovate and develop products and production processes.
misi_3: Increase customer satisfaction through good service, timely delivery, and quality products.
visi_desc: To become a leading company in the electrical industry in Indonesia by providing high-quality, innovative, and sustainable products to meet global customer needs.
layanan_kami_desc: Comprehensive substation solutions designed to optimize operations and drive sustainable growth across all sectors.
desc_aksesoris_gardu_induk: Complete range of connectors, clamps, and support systems for substations and power distribution.
desc_solusi_rekayasa: Comprehensive engineering services from design to implementation, tailored to industrial needs.
desc_jaminan_kualitas: Products comply with ANSI C119.4-2011 standards with rigorous testing and quality control at our certified facilities.
desc_pengadaan_logistik: Efficient procurement and logistics solutions to streamline supply chains and reduce operational costs.
fasilitas_manufaktur_desc: Our modern manufacturing facility is equipped with advanced machinery, overhead crane systems, and quality control processes to ensure every product meets the highest standards of excellence.
hubungi_kami_desc: Have a question or need help? Send us a message and we will contact you shortly.
